title: Alpha client crash
body: So I downloaded the alpha client a few days ago and everything was working fine, but after the update to 6.22 the alpha client icon went away. So being unable to find it I just re-installed it. When re-installing it wrote over the old installation but now it crashes anytime i try to open it. Please help.

replies.body:
Do you get a specific error message when the Alpha Client crashes? Just as a heads-up, we can only offer *limited troubleshooting* until the client gets updated to Beta. 

I'd recommend uninstalling the Alpha completely, then trying the newest Alpha Client installer from [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download) Let me know if this helped.
when i click on the alpha client icon it just goes right to a bugsplat.
Can you try going to the normal client, not the alpha one, and then clicking the repair option? I think that fixed it for me.  But I'm not positive.
This worked for me too, thanks for the help. In case anyone doesn't know, to repair click the settings gear on the upper right (before pressing launch).
This did it! It fixed my problem! Thank you!
Pretty sure these two are related: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/jOuJuqAF-alpha-client-disappeared-download-link

Tried this after uninstalling all of League, legacy and all, then re-installing from square one to receive the same results as everyone else at the moment. At this rate, the Alpha icon is gone, but still in the system. I can't access either of them due to the "patching kernel has stopped working".
There is nothing we could do at the moment... we need a new alpha installer ... same shiet happens to me too:(

HOW TO FIX ERROR WITH NEW BETA CLIENT (****Linux Installs only****)

Navigate to:

/home/USER/PlayOnLinux'svirtualdrives/LeagueOfLegends/drive_c/RiotGames/LeagueofLegends/RADS/system/user.cfg

In User.cfg:

Change where it says LeagueClientOptIn from yes to no

Remember to click save and then launch back with the original client

- Hope this works because it did for me.

So i trie downloading the alpaha client when it showed me that i can do so in the lunchers starting page and when it downloaded i tried to open lol and it said that another instance of leuge is runing close that to contnue and i tried closing the alpaha client but it want close and its just a black scrren plz help

I can confirm that the repair option suggested in this thread has resolved the issue (at least for me). If you still have access to the original client, open it and click on the question icon in the upper right to run the repair utility.
The repair also worked for me too, but the alpha client is now permanently bugsplatted as a downside
Same thing is happening to me dude, really need help on this. I hope you get yours fixed.

You should be able to find a functional *League Client* shortcut in your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).

If it didn't try [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) as listed above, as it seems to be resolving this for some players.
